detailSets.label: General
detailSets.description: Methods of mechanical redistribution of sea ice

details.label: Horizontal Transport
details.description: What is the method of horizontal advection of sea ice?

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

details.label: Transport In Thickness Space
details.description: What is the method of sea ice transport in thickness space (i.e. in thickness categories)?

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

details.label: Ice Strength Formulation
details.description: Which method of sea ice strength formulation is used?

details.label: Redistribution
details.description: Which processes can redistribute sea ice?

details.label: Rheology
details.description: Rheology, what is the ice deformation formulation?

choices.label: elastic-visco-plastic
choices.description: EVP

choices.label: visco-plastic
choices.description: VP

subProcesses.label: Energy
subProcesses.description: Processes related to energy in sea ice thermodynamics

details.label: Enthalpy Formulation
details.description: What is the energy formulation?

choices.label: Pure ice latent and sensible heat
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + brine heat reservoir (Semtner 3-layer)
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + explicit brine inclusions (Bitz and Lipscomb)

details.label: Thermal Conductivity
details.description: What type of thermal conductivity is used?

details.label: Heat Diffusion
details.description: What is the method of heat diffusion?

choices.label: Conduction, radiation and latent heat transport

details.label: Basal Heat Flux
details.description: Method by which basal ocean heat flux is handled?

choices.label: Heat Reservoir
choices.description: Brine inclusions treated as a heat reservoir

choices.label: Thermal Fixed Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)

choices.label: Thermal Varying Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with varying salinity

details.label: Fixed Salinity Value
details.description:
If you have selected "Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity),
            supply the fixed salinity value for each sea ice layer.

details.label: Heat Content Precip
details.description: Describe the method by which the heat content of precipitation is handled.

subProcesses.label: Mass
subProcesses.description: Processes related to mass in sea ice thermodynamics

details.label: New Ice Formation
details.description: Describe the method by which new sea ice is formed in open water.

details.label: Ice Vertical Growth And Melt
details.description: Describe the method that governs the vertical growth and melt of sea ice.

details.label: Ice Lateral Melting
details.description: What is the method of sea ice lateral melting?

details.label: Ice Surface Sublimation
details.description: Describe the method that governs sea ice surface sublimation.

details.label: Frazil Ice
details.description: Describe the method of frazil ice formation.

subProcesses.label: Salt
subProcesses.description: Processes related to salt in sea ice thermodynamics.

details.label: Has Multiple Sea Ice Salinities
details.description:
Does the sea ice model use two different salinities; one for thermodynamic
         calculations and one for the salt budget?

details.label: Sea Ice Salinity Thermal Impacts
details.description: Does sea ice salinity impact the thermal properties of sea ice?

details.label: Salinity Type
details.description: How is salinity determined in the mass transport of salt calculation?

enum.description: Method of describing the value(s) of salinity
enum.label: salinity_method

details.label: Constant Salinity Value
details.description: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Describe the salinity profile used.

details.label: Salinity
details.description: How is salinity determined in the thermodynamic calculation?

enum.description: Method of describing the value(s) of salinity
enum.label: salinity_method

details.label: Constant Salinity Value
details.description: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Describe the salinity profile used.

details.label: Representation
details.description: How is the sea ice thickness distribution represented?

choices.label: Virtual (enhancement of thermal conductivity, thin ice melting)

enum.description: Types of sea ice thickness representation
enum.label: ice_thickness_representation

details.label: Are Included
details.description: Are melt ponds included in the sea ice model?

details.label: Formulation
details.description: What method of melt pond formulation is used?

details.label: Impacts
details.description: What do melt ponds have an impact on?

subProcesses.label: Snow Processes
subProcesses.description: Thermodynamic processes in snow on sea ice

details.label: Has Snow Aging
details.description: Set to True if the sea ice model has a snow aging scheme.

details.label: Snow Aging Scheme
details.description: Describe the snow aging scheme.

details.label: Has Snow Ice Formation
details.description: Set to True if the sea ice model has snow ice formation.

details.label: Snow Ice Formation Scheme
details.description: Describe the snow ice formation scheme.

details.label: Redistribution
details.description: What is the impact of ridging on snow cover?

details.label: Heat Diffusion
details.description: What is the heat diffusion through snow methodology in sea ice thermodynamics?

details.label: Surface Albedo
details.description: Method used to handle surface albedo.

choices.label: Multi-band albedo
choices.description: Albedo value has a spectral dependence

choices.label: Parameterized
choices.description: Sea ice albedo is parameterized

enum.description: Surface albedo of sea ice component
enum.label: seaice_albedo

details.label: Ice Radiation Transmission
details.description: Method by which solar radiation through sea ice is handled.

choices.label: Ice radiation transmission per category
choices.description: Radiation transmission through ice is different for each sea ice category

enum.description: Surface albedo of sea ice component
enum.label: ice_trans

details.label: Grid
details.description: Grid on which sea ice is horizontal discretised?

choices.label: Atmosphere Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the atmospheric grid

choices.label: Ocean grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the ocean grid

choices.label: Own Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on its own independent grid

enum.description: Grid which is the sea ice horizontally discretised on?
enum.label: horizontal_grid

details.label: Grid Type
details.description: What is the type of sea ice grid?

choices.label: Adaptive grid
choices.description: Computational grid changes during the run

details.label: Scheme
details.description: What is the advection scheme?

details.label: Thermodynamics Time Step
details.description: What is the time step in the sea ice model thermodynamic component in seconds.

details.label: Dynamics Time Step
details.description: What is the time step in the sea ice model dynamic component in seconds.

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Specify any additional horizontal discretisation details.

details.label: Layering
details.description: What type of sea ice vertical layers are implemented for purposes of thermodynamic calculations?

choices.label: Multi-level
choices.description: Simulation uses more than two layers

choices.label: Two-levels
choices.description: Simulation uses two layers.

choices.label: Zero-layer
choices.description: Simulation has no internal ice thermodynamics.

details.label: Number Of Layers
details.description: If using multi-layers specify how many.

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Specify any additional vertical grid details.

detailSets.label: Seaice Categories
detailSets.description: What method is used to represent sea ice categories ?

details.label: Has Mulitple Categories
details.description: Set to true if the sea ice model has multiple sea ice categories.

details.label: Number Of Categories
details.description: If using sea ice categories specify how many.

details.label: Category Limits
details.description: If using sea ice categories specify each of the category limits.

details.label: Ice Thickness Distribution Scheme
details.description: Describe the sea ice thickness distribution scheme

details.label: Other
details.description: If the sea ice model does not use sea ice categories specify any additional details.

details.label: Has Snow On Ice
details.description: Is snow on ice represented in this model?

details.label: Number Of Snow Levels
details.description: Number of vertical levels of snow on ice?

details.label: Snow Fraction
details.description: Describe how the snow fraction on sea ice is determined

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Specify any additional details related to snow on ice.

detailSets.label: Variables
detailSets.description: General key properties in sea ice

details.label: Prognostic
details.description: List of prognostic variables in the sea ice component.

choices.label: Snow depth
choices.description: Snow on ice thickness

choices.label: Snow temperature
choices.description: Snow on ice temperature

enum.description: Prognostic variables in sea ice model
enum.label: prognostic_variables

detailSets.label: Seawater Properties
detailSets.description: Properties of seawater relevant to sea ice

details.label: Ocean Freezing Point
details.description: Equation used to compute the freezing point (in deg C) of seawater, as a function of salinity and pressure

choices.label: Constant
choices.description: Constant value of seawater freezing point is used.

choices.label: TEOS-10
choices.description: Thermodynamic equation of seawater 2010

enum.description: Types of seawater freezing point equation in sea ice.
enum.label: seawater_freezing_point

details.label: Ocean Freezing Point Value
details.description: If using a constant seawater freezing point, specify this value.

detailSets.label: Resolution
detailSets.description: Resolution in the sea ice grid

details.label: Name
details.description:
This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid
               e.g. N512L180, T512L70, ORCA025 etc.

details.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
details.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

details.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
details.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

detailSets.label: Tuning Applied
detailSets.description: Tuning applied to sea ice model component

details.label: Description
details.description:
General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained.
               Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics,
               and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle
               with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

details.label: Target
details.description: What was the aim of tuning, e.g. correct sea ice minima, correct seasonal cycle.

details.label: Simulations
details.description: Which simulations had tuning applied, e.g. all, not historical, only pi-control?

details.label: Metrics Used
details.description: List any observed metrics used in tuning model/parameters

details.label: Variables
details.description: Which variables were changed during the tuning process?

detailSets.label: Assumptions
detailSets.description: Assumptions made in the sea ice model

details.label: Description
details.description: General overview description of any *key* assumptions made in this model.

details.label: On Diagnostic Variables
details.description: Note any assumptions that specifically affect the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables.

details.label: Missing Processes
details.description:
List any *key* processes missing in this model configuration? Provide full details
             where this affects the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables?

detailSets.label: Conservation
detailSets.description: Conservation in the sea ice component

details.label: Description
details.description: Provide a general description of conservation methodology.

details.label: Properties
details.description: Properties conserved in sea ice by the numerical schemes.

enum.description: List of properties that can be conserved in sea ice
enum.label: conserved_properties

details.label: Budget
details.description: For each conserved property, specify the output variables which close the related budgets.

details.label: Was Flux Correction Used
details.description: Does conservation involved flux correction ?

details.label: Corrected Conserved Prognostic Variables
details.description: List any variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.
